title: Lanka rolls out red carpet for IIFA stars
content: The Sri Lanka Tourist Board said some of the most popular Indian actors have confirmed their participation at the 11th International Indian Film Academy Awards which will be held at the Sugathadasa Indoor stadium on June 5. Actors Sanjaya Dutt, Bipasha Basu, Sharman Joshi, Genelia D’Souza, Rajiv Kapoor, Malaika Arora, Aamna Sharif, Sarina Khan and…
